page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LISA
page.content: A typical Monday for me is I wake up at 8.00am and get up ten minutes later. For breakfast I have cereal and a glass of milk then my friend comes round for me at 8.30 to go to school. From 9.00 to 9.25 we have a form period then we go to History until 10.35. After break we have French, dinner is at 12noon. In the afternoon is Science and then Art. I get home at 4.00pm and sit down with a cup of coffee and watch television for half an hour. I am very keen on ballet and have classes on Monday night. First of all I do modern until 6.00,then ballet until 7.00 followed by a higher class of ballet until 8.30.By then I am really worn out and can't wait till I get home when I have my dinner. I then have to do my homework. Finally I have a wash and go to bed about 10.00pm.
